doc.title: 'Loco' Motive
doc.plot: After coming across a well-nourished German, Felix the Cat decides that Germany is a land of riches. Making a zeppelin out of a bratwurst he flies to Germany, but is shot down when his airship blocks an astronomer's view of Venus.

After coming across a well-nourished German, Felix the Cat decides that Germany is a land of riches. Making a zeppelin out of a bratwurst he flies to Germany, but is shot down when his airship blocks an astronomer's view of Venus.
